story_description: As a user, I want to see all devices on my network
As a user, I want to see device types and manufacturers
As a user, I want to see network traffic patterns
As a user, I want real-time packet capture
As a user, I want automated anomaly detection
As a user, I want dual ML models for accuracy
As a user, I want the system to learn normal behavior
As a developer, I want automated feature extraction
As a user, I want to receive alerts for anomalies
As a user, I want email notifications for critical alerts
As a user, I want push notifications on my mobile
As a user, I want alerts prioritized by severity
As a user, I want a web-based dashboard
As a user, I want to visualize network topology in 3D
As a user, I want real-time traffic charts
As a user, I want secure login
As an admin, I want protection against brute force
As a user, I want to mark devices as trusted
As a user, I want to group devices
As a user, I want to block malicious devices
As a user, I want IoT protocol detection
As a user, I want smart home device monitoring
As a user, I want privacy leak detection
As a user, I want PDF security reports
As a user, I want to export data as CSV
